stories.text:
Hi everybody,

It's the first time i make a startup in the B2C space and despite having some very preliminary ideas (2) for monetization, my main goal initially is going to be user acquisition.

Given that I already struggled to find numbers to derive TAM, SAM, SOM and the business model isn't conceptualized in actual $ number, can I express my TAM, SAM and SOM in terms of users instead of $?
